name: chsspwh

body.origin:
|- wss(cch, cpw(chba))
-| wss(cch, csh)
-| wss(csh, cpw(chba))
body.pretty:
⊢ CH ⊆ P(~H)
⊣ CH ⊆ SH
⊣ SH ⊆ P(~H)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(cch, cpw(chba))
-| wss(cch, csh)
-| wss(csh, cpw(chba))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ CH ⊆ P(~H)
⊣ CH ⊆ SH
⊣ SH ⊆ P(~H)

comment: Closed subspaces are subsets of Hilbert space. (Contributed by NM, 24-Nov-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
